Brooklyn Historical Society
Brooklyn Historical Society collection of genealogical records
Riviere, Mary Ann
Cassel, Rosemary
ARC.311
0.1 Linear Feet in three folders
1892-1998 The collection consists of genealogical records relating to Brooklyn families that have been collected by Brooklyn Historical Society, dating from 1892 to 1998. Families include Allen, Bueker, Foster, Greene, Metz, Sparacino, Walker, and others. Types of materials include death certificates, marriage certificates, photographs, and clippings. A0133
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Gifts of Mary Ann Riviere (1998) and Rosemary Cassel (2015). Source of acquisition of the Metz-Greene family genealogical file is unknown.
Scope and Contents
The collection consists of genealogical records relating to Brooklyn families that have been collected by Brooklyn Historical Society, dating from 1892 to 1998. Families include Allen, Bueker, Foster, Greene, Metz, Sparacino, Walker, and others. Types of materials include death certificates, marriage certificates, photographs, and clippings.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to users without restriction.
Conditions Governing Use
The copyright status of this collection has not been assessed. Please consult library staff for more details.
Arrangement
Arranged alphabetically by surname.
Processing Information
Minimally processed to the collection level.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Historical Society collection of genealogical records, ARC.311, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
Genealogy -- New York (State) -- Kings County Clippings (information artifacts) Photographs Genealogies Death certificates Marriage certificates Metz family Green family Greene family Sparacino family Walker family Allen family Foster family Pacher family Bueker family Riviere, Mary Ann Cassel, Rosemary
